text: The renowned ‘can-do’ spirit of our state and compassion of our communities has kept us strong. For that, among many other blessings, we can be immensely thankful. #HappyThanksgiving
I hope everyone has a safe and #HappyThanksgiving –NP http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsnpomiXQAElsjc.jpg

“I am grateful for what I am and have. My thanksgiving is perpetual.” – Henry David Thoreau.

Wishing everybody a very Happy Thanksgiving full of gratitude, love and good food! #GiveThanks http://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/Dsm-DBgXgAAee0y.jpg https://video.twimg.com/tweet_video/Dsm-DBgXgAAee0y.mp4

In Texas, we’ve made long strides on the road to recovery in the first year since Hurricane Harvey. And though we have faced other natural disasters and heartbreaking hardships, Texans have stood strong and persevered. #TexasStrong #HappyThanksgiving

Outrage & scandal dominates the news because it attracts viewers & online clicks.

But everyday our fellow Americans are committing acts of kindness. Most never make the news.

I am thankful for the most generous,caring & compassionate people on earth,Americans. #Thanksgiving2018 https://twitter.com/maryvought/status/1065377925426495488 QT @MaryVought Not all heroes wear capes. @UPS @UPSHelp, your amazing employee made sure my daughter got her critical medicine before the #thanksgiving holiday. He tried our house twice knowing it needed to refrigerated. If it went bad it would have cost us thousands of dollars. #wearegrateful http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dsj7kveWkAAfI3m.jpg
RT @mayaharris_ Classic Kamala! 😂 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsoOC-PVsAAGjer.jpg
#ImThankfulFor those who serve and defend our country, and their families. They have dedicated their lives to service and we cannot ever thank them enough for all that they do.

The LORD is gracious and merciful,slow to anger and abounding in mercy. The LORD is good to all,compassionate toward all your works. All your works give you thanks, LORD and your faithful bless you. Psalms 145:8-10

We must remember all those who cannot spend this day with their families. For all our military men and women fighting to protect our liberty, and all the family members who love and support them, we will be forever thankful for your sacrifices.
We thank God for our country, which is a beacon of freedom for the world, and for the generations of men and women who have stood, and continue to stand ready to defend it.
Across America, families, friends, and loved ones gather together to reflect and celebrate the blessings of liberty. #HappyThanksgiving

Today I’m thinking about all the families impacted by wildfires in California and I’m grateful for the firefighters, first responders, & local officials who have worked tirelessly to contain fires across our state. They are heroes & we cannot thank them enough. #HappyThanksgiving

Turkey and sides are finally done and we're all ready to dig in. Grateful to be with family, friends, and good food! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsqJi9dXgAMTvgX.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsqJjISXQAAQ7cJ.jpg

Before you set off to celebrate with family, friends, and loved ones, I wanted to let you know how thankful I am for all of you.

Together, we did something amazing this year–we won back a Majority in the House. Come January, that Majority will fight for our values & priorities.
